subject: Science
title: My Amazing Senses
learningObjectives: Identify and name the five senses: sight, hearing, smell, taste, and touch.
Understand that each sense helps us explore the world.
Use descriptive language for sensory experiences.

content.body: We have five senses that help us learn about the world. Let's explore them!

content.alt: Icons representing the five senses: an eye, an ear, a nose, a mouth, and a hand.

content.body: We use our eyes to see, our ears to hear, our nose to smell, our tongue to taste, and our hands to touch.

questions.question: Which sense do you use to see a rainbow?
Which sense do you use to feel a soft blanket?

content.body: Tenemos cinco sentidos que nos ayudan a aprender sobre el mundo. ¡Vamos a explorarlos!

questions.question: ¿Qué sentido usas para ver un arcoíris?
¿Qué sentido usas para sentir una manta suave?
